Uses of Package
environment

  • Packages that use environment 
    Package Description
    environment  
    environment.city  
    environment.city.parking

    simulation.scenario  
  • Classes in environment used by environment 
    Class and Description
    ActionableByMicroAgent
    Implementing this interface on a world object allows an object to be the target of a specific Action.
    MicroAgentAction
    Action allows agents to interact with the environment.
    MicroAgentBody
    This AgentBody is an implementation of the abstract class AbstractAgentBody used in every current scenario of SmartGov.
    Perceivable
    Implementing this interface allows the agent to perceive the current object as part of the environment.
    WorldObject
    WorldObject is the basic abstract class for every element of the simulation.
    WorldObjectTexture
    WorldObjectTexture is the abstract class for any WorldObject that is represent by a dot in the simulation (e.g.: a parking spot, a road junction an agent, ...).
  • Classes in environment used by environment.city 
    Class and Description
    ActionableByMicroAgent
    Implementing this interface on a world object allows an object to be the target of a specific Action.
    MicroAgentAction
    Action allows agents to interact with the environment.
    Structure
    A structure is a specific world object use to describe important elements of the environment.
    WorldObject
    WorldObject is the basic abstract class for every element of the simulation.
    WorldObjectShape
    WorldObjectShape is the abstract class for any WorldObject in the simulation represented by a polyline.
